comment.author: 60142746@N00
comment._content: The Kingsway subway closed when trams were withdrawn from London in 1952. The southern end became a one way underpass for car traffic: the northern end is still in existence but is disused.

comment.author: 48094458@N00
comment._content: (Dons anorak) "A 33 was the Goons' Last Tram from Clapham."

comment.author: 13407304@N05
comment._content: The northern end of the Kingsway Subway is used as an emergency control room and was last used during the London 2012 Olympics.
